Name: Vilma
description:
Vilma is 44 years old and has six children. Vilma is married and has three children who are currently in school.

Vilma is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. Vilma requested a PHP 14000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Vilma has been raising livestock for 6 years now, and has borrowed 4 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Vilma would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.
